trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemSelect"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemSelect"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListSelectEventArgs"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListSelectEventArgs"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListSelectEventArgs.ListItem*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListSelectEventArgs.ListItem*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListSelectEventArgs.ListItem*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListSelectEventArgs.SelectMore*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListSelectEventArgs.SelectMore*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListSelectEventArgs.SelectMore*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the list item that is being bound.
trans-unit.target: 返回要绑定的列表项。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: The list item that is being bound.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定列表项。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the event argument starts with `ShowMore`.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否以开头的事件自变量`ShowMore`。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: `ShowMore` indicates an event that shows the details of an item.
trans-unit.target: `ShowMore`表示一个显示项的详细信息的事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event argument starts with `ShowMore`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件自变量开头`ShowMore`; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether default handling must be used.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否必须使用默认处理。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if default handling must be used; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果必须使用默认处理;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
